name: White Wine
directions: Pour a full glass and sip slow

name: Red Wine
directions: Pour a full glass and sip slow

name: Beer
ingredients: Full body beer of your choice!

name: White Russian
directions: Fill glass with ice;Pour 5 parts vodka into glass;Pour 2 parts of coffee liqueur into glass;Fill glass to brim with cream;Enjoy!

name: Champagne
directions: Fill chilled glass with champagne; Celebrate!

name: Black Russian
directions: Fill glass with ice;Pour 5 parts vodka into glass;Pour 2 parts of coffee liqueue into glass;Stir gently and enjoy

name: Rum & Coke
directions: Fill glass with ice;Pour 12 parts cola into glass;Pour 5 parts white rum into glass;Pour 1 part fresh lime juice into glass;Add lime wedge and enjoy!

name: ScrewDriver
directions: Fill glass with ice;Pour 5 parts vodka into glass;Pour 10 parts orange juice into glass;Add orange slice and enjoy!

name: Manhattan
ingredients: Canadian whisky;sweet red vermouth;dash angostura bitters;maraschino cherry
directions: Pour 5 parts whisky, vermouth, and bitters into mixing glass with ice;stir well;strain into chilled cocktail glass;Add cherry and enjoy!

name: Vodka on the rocks
directions: Fill glass with ice;Pour vodka into glass;Try to enjoy!
